DOC.brief_summary: This observational study recruit healthy individual routinely take high amount ( least 3 g/wk ) dietary eicosapentaenoic acid ( EPA ) docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ) , n't , examines efficacy dietary EPA DHA ameliorate cardiopulmonary effect exposure ambient air pollution .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Omega-3 Fatty Acids Ambient Air Pollution Exposure Healthy Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : To examine relationship blood level dietary eicosapentaenoic acid ( EPA ) docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ) cardiopulmonary response environmental air pollution healthy adult . EPA DHA two important omega-3 fatty acid mainly find seafood fish oil associate beneficial effect human physiology . Participants : Healthy 35-55 year-old male female subject screen dietary intake EPA DHA . Qualified volunteer divide two group , group 1 : individual voluntarily take least 3 g/wk EPA DHA dietary source include fish oil supplement ocean fish/shellfish consumption period least 6 month prior enrollment study ; group 2 : individual consume 1 serve size ( 4-6 oz ) /month ocean fish/shellfish , 1 pill/month fish oil supplement 6 month period precede enrollment . Procedures ( Methods ) : In observational panel study , subject come U.S. EPA Human Studies Facility 5 session , consist 2 consecutive visit day . The following endpoint collect : blood pressure , heart rate variability measurement , blood biomarkers , endothelial cell function , retinal venule arteriole diameter , lung function . Air pollution exposure assess use area-specific air quality data derive local air monitoring station interfaced activity monitoring GPS track location subject .
DOC.criteria: Aged 3555 year old healthy male female ( 19≤BMI≤30 ) . Normal rest ECG . No history heart arrhythmia . Oxygen saturation great 96 % time physical exam . Taking least 3 gram EPA DHA dietary source include fish oil supplement ocean fish/shellfish 6 month long period time precede enrollment study ; take 1 serve size ( 46 oz ) /month ocean fish/shellfish , 1 pill/month fish oil supplement previous 6 month long period time . Individuals history acute chronic cardiovascular disease , myocardial infarction . Individuals history chronic respiratory disease , COPD asthma . Individuals history cancer ( possible exception history nonmelanoma skin cancer ) . Uncontrolled hypertension ( ≥150 systolic , ≥90 diastolic ) . Individuals diabetic ( previously diagnose hemoglobin A1c level > 6.4 % ) . Individuals currently smoke ( include vaping , use hookah e cigarette ) smoke history within 1 year study ( define 1 pk/yr past year ) great than/equal 5 pack year smoke history . Individuals live smoker smoke inside house . Individuals regularly expose high level vapor , dust , gas , fume . Individuals understand speak English . Individuals take bblocker medication . Individuals take statin . Individuals unwilling unable maintain current dietary pattern whole study . Individuals bleed clot disorder . Individuals active allergy . Individuals allergy latex , skin allergy tape electrodes . Individuals pregnant attempt become pregnant . Individuals unspecified illness , judgment investigator might increase risk associate clinical procedure basis exclusion . Individuals currently take antidepressant . Temporary exclusion criterion : Individuals recent ( within 6 month ) abdominal and/or eye surgery , diagnose type hernia , well contraindication raise intraabdominal pressure . Individuals acute respiratory illness within 4 week .
